parameters.name: CloudProduct
parameters.description: The cloud service in the deployment task.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The ID of the deployment task. You can call the [CreateDeploymentJob](~~2712234~~) operation to obtain the ID of a deployment task from the **ID** parameter. You can also call the [ListDeploymentJob](~~2712223~~) operation to obtain the ID of a deployment task.

parameters.name: ShowSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 50.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the worker task.

Valid values:

*   rollback
*   rollback_error
*   success
*   rollback_success
*   pending
*   scheduling
*   processing
*   error
*   editing
